entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
